name: Orbflux: Water
text:
{1}, Discard Orbflux: Water: Meditate (Put an orb counter on a Chi you control. If you donâ€™t control one, first create a Chi enchantment token with "{1}, Sacrifice this: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control with mana value less than or equal to the number of orb counters on this. You may choose new targets for the copy.") 

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Chi. 

Each player returns X creatures they control to its owner's hand, where X is equal to the sacrificed Chi's number of orb counters.
